name: Deceiver God 2018
description:
Graduation Video Game 
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

In a distant future, Horus and Seth perpetuate their ancestral struggle. Of equal strength, they can only win by using deception, cheating and bluffs. Mindgame and combat skills are their best weapons to get the upper hand in this tactical and nervous shooting game.

Platform : PC
Engine : Unreal Engine 4
Number of players : 2

Producer : Nicolas BIAIS
Game Design : Aurélien CHAHINE, Nicolas QUEAU
Game Art : Bosi CHENG, Quentin FOURCADE, Clément LEBRUN
Game Design & Programming : Julien FOURNIER, Guillaume ZEGOUDIA
Game Programming: Yaël BEAUFORT
Music & Sound Design : Sadi WASSEL et Alexandre TRON
